Title: isIPv6String
Description: Determines whether the input string is an IPv6 address or not. If string is IPv4 address returns 0.
1 if string is IPv6 address, 0 otherwise. UInt8.
Examples: SELECT addr, isIPv6String(addr) FROM ( SELECT ['::', '1111::ffff', '::ffff:127.0.0.1', '127.0.0.1'] AS addr ) ARRAY JOIN addr;
